category: Data File Locations Related Global Methods

functions.name: GetDataLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the 'root' data location for the application e.g.
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\VCarve Pro\V7.0" For V7.0 of VCarve Pro on Windows 7.
This is the same folder accessible via "File – OpenApplication Data Folder …" within the program.

signature.label: GetDataLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the 'root' data location for the application e.g. "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetPostProcessorLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the PostP folder location for the program e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\PostP" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

signature.label: GetPostProcessorLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the PostP folder location for the program e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\PostP" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetToolDatabaseLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the Tool Database folder location for the program e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\ToolDatabase" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

signature.label: GetToolDatabaseLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the Tool Database folder location for the program e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\ToolDatabase" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetGadgetsLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the Gadgets folder location for the program e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\Gadgets" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.
Note that the user can also install Gadgets in their local documents folder under …
"Vectric Files\Gadgets\Aspire V4.0"

signature.label: GetGadgetsLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the Gadgets folder location for the program e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\Gadgets" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetToolpathDefaultsLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the ToolpathDefaults folder location for the program e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\ToolpathDefaults" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

signature.label: GetToolpathDefaultsLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the ToolpathDefaults folder location for the program e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\ToolpathDefaults" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetBitmapTexturesLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns the BitmapTextures folder location for the program which stores the bitmaps used for displaying different material types e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\BitmapTextures" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.
Note that the user can also install additional textures in their local documents folder under …
"Vectric Files\Material Images"

signature.label: GetBitmapTexturesLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns the BitmapTextures folder location for the program which stores the bitmaps used for displaying different material types e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\BitmapTextures" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

functions.name: GetVectorTexturesLocation
functions.documentation:
Returns VectorTextures folder location for the program e.g
"C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\VectorTextures" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.

signature.label: GetVectorTexturesLocation()
signature.documentation: Returns VectorTextures folder location for the program e.g "C:\ProgramData\Vectric\Aspire\V4.0\VectorTextures" For V4.0 of Aspire on Windows 7.
